tutorial.speak:
You can make a curated calendar using events from your group calendars. From the Chums dashboard navigate to B1.church
Click on your name and Go to the admin portal
Choose calendars from the mobile app dropdown menu
Click the plus sign and give your calendar a name
Be sure to hit save
Click on the calendar icon to add events
Click add to choose a group
Select a group
Choose any group you want to add to the calendar
You can add all the events from the calendar or choose specific events to add
You now have a curated calender that you can add to your website
